casebody.data:
Roger JOHNSON
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 13, 2016 Justine F. Miller, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Emily D. Trudeau, deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Roger Johnson's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 166 Conn. App. 903 , 137 A.3d 968 (2016), is denied.
